question: Who is a Premier?
possible_answers: A. The Prime Minister is also called the Premier.
B. A Premier has a role similar to that of the Prime Minister in a federal government.
answer: B. A Premier has a role similar to that of the Prime Minister in a federal government.
explanatory_sentence: In each province, the Premier has a role similar to that of the Prime Minister in the federal government, just as the Lieutenant Governor has a role similar to that of the Governor General.
